mapper.select: select Application.ID as ApplicationID, UserID, RoomID, SubmitTime, ZhouCi, XingQi, SJieCi, EJieCi,Application.Type as ApplicationType, Purpose, ReviewerID, ReviewTime, Approval,ReviewContent, User.Name as UserName, Phone, Email, Department, Classroom.Name as ClassroomName, Classroom.Type as RoomType, XiaoQu,JiaoXueQu, JiaoXueLou, Floor, Capacity from Application,User,Classroom where Application.ID=#{id} and Application.UserID=User.ID and Application.RoomID=Classroom.ID;
select * from RoomStatus where RoomID=#{roomID} and ZhouCi=#{zhouCi} and XingQi=#{xingQi};
select * from Application where RoomID=#{roomID} and ZhouCi=#{zhouCi} and XingQi=#{xingQi} and (Approval != 0 or Approval is null);
mapper.update: update Application set ZhouCi=${zhouCi}, XingQi=#{xingQi}, SJieCi=#{sJieCi}, EJieCi=#{eJieCi}, Type=#{type}, Purpose=#{purpose} where ID=${id} ;
mapper.select: select distinct JiaoXueQu from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu};
select distinct JiaoXueLou from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu};
select distinct Type from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu} and JiaoXueLou=#{jiaoXueLou};
select distinct Floor from Classroom where XiaoQu=#{xiaoQu} and JiaoXueQu=#{jiaoXueQu} and JiaoXueLou=#{jiaoXueLou} and Type=#{type};
select * from Semester order by ID desc;
